name: Jewel Maker
description:
Take the adventure and collect the jewels.
Simple, Fast, Funny-game
Play without limit.

■ Various modes allow no time to get bored.
Over 300 stage modes that will have continuous updates in the future

■ Do you find the game to be too difficult?
Jewel Maker has collections that will help you explore.
Explore and carry out updates with the currency that you earn!

■ Endless play without a limit
There is no entrance limit, so you can play as many times as you want.

■ No Data!
You can play offline without a data connection.

■ Clean graphics and simple operation
It is an easy game that you can play as long as you can match 3 jewels of the same color while exploring alongside cute and adorable characters.

■ Low-memory game
Download this low-memory game without storage concerns.

■ Notes
1. If you don't save in-game, the data will be reset if you delete the app. Also, if you switch to another device, the data will be reset as well.
2. It's a free app, but it includes paid products like in-game currency, items, ad removal, and so on.
3. There are full-screen, banner, and video ads.
